data.title: Villar vows to continue opposing divorce bill
data.meta_description: Read this exciting story from The Philippine Star June 03, 2024. Sen. Cynthia Villar will not budge  from her position against divorce  even as her female colleagues in the  Senate are pushing for it, according  to the senator herself.
data.text:
The Philippine Star

ALBERT MARTINEZ MAKES SACRIFICES FOR 'LAVENDER FIELDS' ROLE

AT 63, ALBERT MARTINEZ IS A PICTURE OF GOOD health. His dedication to a healthy lifestyle has paid off, as he needs no maintenance medications and looks much younger than his age.

The Philippine Star

Insurance penetration improves to 1.71% of GDP

The insurance industry saw its net income rise to P28 billion in the first half amid increases in the life and non-life segments with the sector's contribution to the overall economy also improving to 1.71 percent.

The Philippine Star

Consunji, Gotianun recognized by UPAA

Tycoon Isidro Consunji is the sole recipient of this year's University of the Philippines Alumni Association (UPAA) Most Distinguished Alumnus Award.

The Philippine Star

Court clears Meralco's power supply auctions

Manila Electric Co. (Meralco) is forging ahead with its quest for cost-effective power supply following the lifting of a block on its 1,000-megawatt (MW) bidding process.

The Philippine Star

ACEN disburses P7.7 B to boost RE portfolio

Ayala-led ACEN Corp. has invested the remaining proceeds of a share sale last year to accelerate the development of its eligible green energy projects in Luzon.

The Philippine Star

PSEI advances past the 6,900 mark

Shares prices advanced for the third straight session, pushing the stock market past the 6,900 mark on sustained positive cues from wall street.

The Philippine Star

BSP key rate seen at 5% by mid-2025

The Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas (BSP) could deliver two more 25-basispoint rate cuts this year and 75 basis points worth of easing in early 2025 as inflation is likely to remain within target until 2026, according to Metropolitan Bank & Trust Co. (Metrobank).
